Detailed Description

template<class ObjectType, class EvaluatorType>
class stDBMNSplitter< ObjectType, EvaluatorType >

This class template implements the N split algorithm.

Version
1.0
Author
Marcos Rodrigues Vieira (mrvie.nosp@m.ira@.nosp@m.icmc..nosp@m.usp..nosp@m.br)

Member Function Documentation

template<class ObjectType , class EvaluatorType >
stCount stDBMNSplitter< ObjectType, EvaluatorType >::Distribute ( stDBMNode *  oldNode,
tDBMCollection *  returnCollection,
tSubtreeInfo *  promo,
EvaluatorType *  metricEvaluator 
)

Distributes objects between 2 nodes and returnCollection.

Parameters
oldNodeThe recycled node to be use in this method.
returnCollectionThe returning node containing objects that were not covered by the others nodes.
promoRepresentatives of nodes.
metricEvaluatorThe metric evaluator to be used to compute distances.
